arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single volume.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Dr. Stephen Perry was a physician who lived and worked in Northport, Long Island, New York during the mid- and late-nineteenth century.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Stephen Perry account book, 1840-1884, 1973.095, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Stephen Perry account book consists of a single volume and spans the period 1840 to 1884. It lists Dr. Perry's financial transactions for the period 1840 to 1870, and also includes copies of several birth and death certificates pasted into the volume. These documents span the period 1880 to 1884 and are signed by Dr. Perry.
